name: InviteMemberToTrelloBoard
description:
Invite a member to a Trello board via email.

Use this tool to invite a new member to a Trello board using their email address. It is useful for adding collaborators to a project board.

parameters.name: member_email_address
parameters.description: The email address of the user to be added as a member to the Trello board.

value_schema.description: The email address of a user to add as a member of the board.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Trello board to which the member will be invited.

parameters.name: member_access_type
parameters.description: Specifies the role of the new board member. Valid values are: admin, normal, or observer.

value_schema.description: Valid values: admin, normal, observer. Determines what type of member the user being added should be of the board.

parameters.name: user_full_name
parameters.description: The full name of the user being invited. Must be at least 1 character and not begin or end with a space.

value_schema.description: The full name of the user to as a member of the board. Must have a length of at least 1 and cannot begin nor end with a space.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address of a user to add as a member of the board.

value_schema.description: The email address of a user to add as a member of the board.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Valid values: admin, normal, observer. Determines what type of member the user being added should be of the board.

value_schema.description: Valid values: admin, normal, observer. Determines what type of member the user being added should be of the board.

parameters.name: fullName
parameters.description: The full name of the user to as a member of the board. Must have a length of at least 1 and cannot begin nor end with a space.

value_schema.description: The full name of the user to as a member of the board. Must have a length of at least 1 and cannot begin nor end with a space.
